content:
ber 21, 2016
												Ok so let's talk a little bit of this game!One day I was looking at free to play games/store and I saw a S.K.I.L.L - Special Force 2 and I thought WOW this look's intresting but I dind't download because I dind't had time.Next day my friend made a steam account and I helped him because he never had steam before,and when account was ready I said to him "go to store and search for free to play games" and he did it and he saw a SKILL and started downloading.When downloading was finished we tried to start a game but then Laucher poped up but it's ok we said so we were waiting for another download from Laucher(Why the fu*k should I wait againg when game was downloaded from steam).When Game was downloaded/finished we launched SKILL and it was good.When I came home and opened steam and was looking at free to play games again I saw SKILL and I said "I could play this game,It look's nice" and I started downloading it.When Launcher was over with download I started a game,but something was strange,like game doesn"t support 1600x900 resolution it was blurry but I wasn't paying to much attention to resolution because I wanted to see a rest of game,then my friend send me a message to play SKILL so I launched a game and It was fine until cheaters,bugs,glitch,lags or fps drop showed up but I said maybe there are another servers without cheaters etc.,Then my friend said "Hey Wanna play zombie mod" and I was like "Oh yea sure" and then I was invited to lobby so we started to setup a game but there was only 1 map and I though maybe there would be more maps who knows.So we were playing this game like 2-3 days and it was ok until I realised that it's a repetivie game where you need to buy things/items for real money and then I realised that this is Pay to Win game -_- (I buyed some items and it would last only 7-14 days and I was angry,I was like fu*k you game)Problems:-Bad Resolution(I tried on setting but nothing)-Bad Fps-Glitch-Pay to Win   -95% Pay to Win   -5% Free to PlayI recommed that you better prepare your steam wallet/money because in this game you would need it entire time,or try some other free to play games Im sure there are better games than this....

content:
, 2015
												As an avid player of S.K.I.L.L. - Special Force 2, I can safely announce that this game is truly and incomprehensibly, incredibly, ♥♥♥♥♥. With over three thousand hours on this game (ignore my Steam counter, I had an error with it), I am definitely able to say that it is one of the worst games I have played.Every game you enter is constantly full of hackers playing on their 'j-tagged' consoles, using many hacks and cheats including aimbots, wallhacks, aimhacks, and wallbots. The game is truly in a state of such unplayablity that I struggle to have any fun while playing. The sheer number of Russian and Ukranian players joining my servers with their cheats, screaming "♥♥♥♥ ♥♥♥♥♥, ♥♥♥♥ ♥♥♥♥♥." truly amazes me. I was in such a state of awe at how the developer team created such a beautifully crafted game to such a standard at which pre-pubescent eleven year olds find the sanctum in to follow their dreams of hacking and crying and screaming.As a professional video game reviewer, I can safely state that this is the greatest game I've ever played, 10/10.P.S. Nice FOV scrubs.

r 26, 2016
												Started the install, already rather luke warm to this game, not much to distinguish it, and almost no actual gameplay footage, despite FOUR trailers on the page. The installer finally wrapped up, the pre-patcher worked great, patcher froze, then unfroze, and now that we're finally into the game, let's see what this is all ab-"Unfortunately, S.K.I.L.L. - Special Force 2 is not available in your region."Welp.The quit window was rather patronizing as well; telling me "good job" despite not even letting me past the door.At least the uninstaller is available in this region...If you're in North America, do yourself a favor, and give this one a miss.

content:
3, 2015
												This game is what you´d expect from a free2play (and pay2win btw) Shooter. Runs on unreal engine 3, has premium currency and last and definitely least Case (or capsule) openings. The start in this game is a bit hard depending on what weapon you choose, you get called a n00b and get kicked because of said reason.As you rank up, kill players and earn currency you get more respect. However i do not recommend to spend money on weapons and skins because it all (more or less) depends on S.K.I.L.L. I still do recommend getting this game because you can play it with your Friends that cannot afford CS:GO.

3, 2015
												This game is what you´d expect from a free2play (and pay2win btw) Shooter. Runs on unreal engine 3, has premium currency and last and definitely least Case (or capsule) openings. The start in this game is a bit hard depending on what weapon you choose, you get called a n00b and get kicked because of said reason.As you rank up, kill players and earn currency you get more respect. However i do not recommend to spend money on weapons and skins because it all (more or less) depends on S.K.I.L.L. I still do recommend getting this game because you can play it with your Friends that cannot afford CS:GO.

content:
r 31, 2016
												Edit: Just learnt that THIS is Soldier Front 2. Also just realized Soldier Front 2 and Special Force 2 have the same amount of letters....coincidence? I think not. Okay obviously it was intentional...I'm just going to leave.At first when I launched the game it said "Not available in your region". I was pretty bummed out to read that. Gave it a thumbs down. But then I found out when the launcher pops up you have to switch it to North American servers via the launcher in order to play. The servers seem kind of dead to me. Got on to test the game mechanics, feels a little bit like Ghost in The Shell SAC First Assault Online if anyone has played that. I mainly downloaded the game because facebook advertisement and apparently Halloween sale. I went on to see what I could buy via premium currency (just to take a look I swear). Stuff isn't cheap. But hey, you can buy the normal version of weapons for GP or whatever the in-game currency is so thats a plus. Also the weapons are permanent by the looks of it so another plus! They use the good ol' repair system for weapons found in quite a lot of F2PFPS games.

content:
, 2015
												I like it. It's better than most other F2P FPS games. The game uses the durability system instead of timed purchases. It's easy to play, kill-time is quick, each weapon requires practice to get used to, it's like the devs took many of the good elements of the popular FPSs, and put them into this game. It's like Counter-Strike and Call of Duty mixed, in a free package. A lot of fun to play. Great graphics, and runs really well on everything maxed, and I'm using a laptop. Highly recommended.

content:
er 6, 2016
Pros:Maps are the exact same from Soldier Front 2Has a clan system and buddy systemLooks like Soldier Front 2There's a cat skin for the M1. I guess that's a pro, if you can stand the game long enough to get it.Cons:Is not as good as SF2 was (huge balance problems)Common to have players with 300-400+ ping, which sucks for those who have <100. 400 PING. IN AN FPS.You can get shot through wallsHitboxes are badGot stuck on black screen after "tutorial"Tutorial isn't much of a tutorial, it's more of target practice. Teaches you how to crouch jump, doesn't have you swap between primary/secondary or use grenades.Crouch jumping in this game doesn't work very well. Often times it won't work properly.You cannot use the same weapon in multiple loadouts, which means you must have a separate primary and secondary for each loadout.High ranking players can exploit the lobbies and permanently stay in the newbie channels, giving you little chance to progressHackers/aimbotters are also a problemLobby system doesn't have normal wait/ready time, it will instantly go into a match (no prep time)

content:
er 21, 2016
												I would love to leave a positive review for this game, but I'll leave you with an extract from the bee movie script instead :)According to all known lawsof aviation, there is no way a beeshould be able to fly. Its wings are too small to getits fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway because bees don't carewhat humans think is impossible. Yellow, black. Yellow, black.Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Ooh, black and yellow!Let's shake it up a little. Barry! Breakfast is ready! Ooming! Hang on a second. Hello? - Barry?- Adam? - Oan you believe this is happening?- I can't. I'll pick you up. Looking sharp. Use the stairs. Your fatherpaid good money for those. Sorry. I'm excited. Here's the graduate.We're very proud of you, son. A perfect report card, all B's. Very proud. Ma! I got a thing going here. - You got lint on your fuzz.- Ow! That's me! - Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.- Bye! Barry, I told you,stop flying in the house! - Hey, Adam.- Hey, Barry. - Is that fuzz gel?- A little. Special day, graduation. Never thought I'd make it. Three days grade school,three days high school. Those were awkward. Three days college. I'm glad I tooka day and hitchhiked around the hive. You did come back different. - Hi, Barry.- Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good. - Hear about Frankie?- Yeah. - You going to the funeral?- No, I'm not going. Everybody knows,sting someone, you die. Don't waste it on a squirrel.Such a hothead. I guess he could havejust gotten out of the way. I love this incorporatingan amusement park into our day. That's why we don't need vacations. Boy, quite a bit of pomp...under the circumstances. - Well, Adam, today we are men.- We are! - Bee-men.- Amen! Hallelujah! Students, faculty, distinguished bees, please welcome Dean Buzzwell. Welcome, New Hive Oitygraduating class of... ...9:15. That concludes our ceremonies. And begins your careerat Honex Industries! Will we pick ourjob today? I heard it's just orientation. Heads up! Here we go. Keep your hands and antennasinside the tram at all times. - Wonder what it'll be like?- A little scary. Welcome to Honex,a division of Honesco and a part of the Hexagon Group. This is it! Wow. Wow. We know that you, as a bee,have worked your whole life to get to the point where youcan work for your whole life. Honey begins when our valiant PollenJocks bring the nectar to the hive. Our top-secret formula is automatically color-corrected,scent-adjusted and bubble-contoured into this soothing sweet syrup with its distinctivegolden glow you know as... Honey! - That girl was hot.- She's my cousin! - She is?- Yes, we're all cousins. - Right. You're right.- At Honex, we constantly strive to improve every aspectof bee existence. These bees are stress-testinga new helmet technology. - What do you think he makes?- Not enough. Here we have our latest advancement,the Krelman. - What does that do?- Oatches that little strand of honey that hangs after you pour it.Saves us millions. Oan anyone work on the Krelman? Of course. Most bee jobs aresmall ones. But bees know that every small job,if it's done well, means a lot. But choose carefully because you'll stay in the jobyou pick for the rest of your life. The same job the rest of your life?I didn't know that. What's the difference? You'll be happy to know that bees,as a species, haven't had one day off in 27 million years. So you'll just work us to death? We'll sure try. Wow! That blew my mind! "What's the difference?"How can you say that? One job forever?That's an insane choice to have to make. I'm relieved. Now we only haveto make one decision in life. But, Adam, how could theynever have told us that? Why would you question anything?We're bees. We're the most perfectlyfunctioning society on Earth. You ever think maybe thingswork a little too well here? Like what? Give me one example. I don't know. But you knowwhat I'm talking about. Please clear the gate.Royal Nectar Force on approach. Wait a second. Oheck it out. - Hey, those are Pollen Jocks!- Wow. I've never seen them this close. They know what it's likeoutside the hive. Yeah, but some don't come back. - Hey, Jocks!- Hi, Jocks! You guys did great! You're monsters!You're sky freaks! I love it! I love it! - I wonder where they were.- I don't know. Their day's not planned. Outside the hive, flying who knowswhere, doing who knows what. You can'tjust decide to be a PollenJock. You have to be bred for that. Right. Look. That's more pollenthan you and I will see in a lifetime. It's just a status symbol.Bees make too much of it. Perhaps. Unless you're wearing itand the ladies see you wearing it. Those ladies?Aren't they our cousins too? Distant. Distant. Look at these two. - Oouple of Hive Harrys.- Let's have fun with them. It must be dangerousbeing a Pollen Jock. Yeah. Once a bear pinned meagainst a mushroom! He had a paw on my throat,and with the other, he was slapping me! - Oh, my!- I never thought I'd knock him out. What were you doing during this? Trying to alert the authorities. I can autograph that. A little gusty out there today,wasn't it, comrades? Yeah. Gusty. We're hitting a sunflower patchsix miles from here tomorrow. - Six miles, huh?- Barry! A puddle jump for us,but maybe you're not up for it. - Maybe I am.- You are not! We're going 0900 at J-Gate. What do you think, buzzy-boy?Are you bee enough? I might be. It all dependson what 0900 means. Hey, Honex! Dad, you surprised me. You decide what you're interested in? - Well, there's a lot of choices.- But you only get one. Do you ever get boreddoing the same job every day? Son, let me tell you about stirring. You grab that stick, and you justmove it around, and you stir it around. You get yourself into a rhythm.It's a beautiful thing. You know, Dad,the more I think about it, maybe the honey fieldjust isn't right for me. You were thinking of what,making balloon animals? That's a bad jobfor a guy with a stinger. Janet, your son's not surehe wants to go into honey! - Barry, you are so funny sometimes.- I'm not trying to be funny. You're not funny! You're goinginto honey. Our son, the stirrer! - You're gonna be a stirrer?- No one's listening to me! Wait till you see the sticks I have. I could say anything right now.I'm gonna get an ant tattoo! Let's open some honey and celebrate! Maybe I'll pierce my thorax.Shave my antennae. Shack up with a grasshopper. Geta gold tooth and call everybody "dawg"! I'm so proud. - We're starting work today!- Today's the day. Oome on! All the good jobswill be gone. Yeah, right. Pollen counting, stunt bee, pouring,stirrer, front desk, hair removal... - Is it still available?- Hang on. Two left! One of them's yours! Oongratulations!Step to the side. - What'd you get?- Picking crud out. Stellar! Wow! Oouple of newbies? Yes, sir! Our first day! We are ready! Make your choice. - You want to go first?- No, you go. Oh, my. What's available? Restroom attendant's open,not for the reason you think. - Any chance of getting the Krelman?- Sure, you're on. I'm sorry, the Krelman just closed out. Wax monkey's always open. The Krelman opened up again. What happened? A bee died. Makes an opening. See?He's dead. Another dead one. Deady. Deadi

content:
r 27, 2016
												This is another one of those games, where I could play the hell out of it when I was younger but now that I'm older I now see how bad the game truly is.I'm from North America, so when I heard they where going to be adding North American servers, I was pretty pumped because I played this title a good amount a few years back. But now, I can truly see how bad this game is, and I'll never understand how I could have played this game so much in the past.Lets start off with the currency.. If you're a free player, be ready for a grind! You don't earn credits when completing a match, you have to do challenges to get credits. For example, Kill 50 people with an AR, and in return you will get 50 credits (GP). Guns take any where from 10k+. This is just one of the easy challenges, it gets harder and more annoying. So if your not paying, be ready for a grind and most likely you will be using guns / items you don't even like just to earn credits.Although I wouldn't call this game pay to win, it's very close to being very pay to win.Give the game  a shot, but I promise you won't see anything you haven't already seen in these free to play shooters.

er 7, 2015
												It's ok for your typical Korean F2P shooter fare but with more mainstream graphics and permanent weapons. Plus the starting guns are pretty good making for surprisingly balanced gameplay here. The paid mechanics are a total joke though, first you have to pay for a premium membership and then pay money on top of that to get the cash shop guns, essentially spending money to then spend money. Better off just playing for free as the base guns aren't completely useless.

r 27, 2016
												This is another one of those games, where I could play the hell out of it when I was younger but now that I'm older I now see how bad the game truly is.I'm from North America, so when I heard they where going to be adding North American servers, I was pretty pumped because I played this title a good amount a few years back. But now, I can truly see how bad this game is, and I'll never understand how I could have played this game so much in the past.Lets start off with the currency.. If you're a free player, be ready for a grind! You don't earn credits when completing a match, you have to do challenges to get credits. For example, Kill 50 people with an AR, and in return you will get 50 credits (GP). Guns take any where from 10k+. This is just one of the easy challenges, it gets harder and more annoying. So if your not paying, be ready for a grind and most likely you will be using guns / items you don't even like just to earn credits.Although I wouldn't call this game pay to win, it's very close to being very pay to win.Give the game  a shot, but I promise you won't see anything you haven't already seen in these free to play shooters.

content:
, 2015
												A great game for those who are new to FPS genre.Negatives:i feel like it's actually too easy for me (I'm ranked MG2 in CS:GO), aiming down the sights feels pointless, because the recoil on guns isn't very big, and there's also available some kind of armor, that obviously let's you take more damage, and that's quite annoying. Unfortunately the community seems kind of toxic to me, everyone's insulting each other for no apparent reasons (today i was called "noob" from one guy, who couldn't kill me from the same camping spot 3 rounds in a row :D).Positives:surprisingly this game is good and very solid, haven't noticed that it would be pay to win, but i do think there are some better guns, that you need a lot of money for to buy/rent them, but i consider it as a reward for players who get invested in the game. There are also interesting new game modes, I haven't seen before, and I've played different FPSs for 10 years, but they sure could use some balancing and tweaks.To sum everything up - I like the game, probably because it requires no effort to play from me, unlike Counter Strike, give it a try ;)

content:
, 2015
												Alright after playing this game for a few hours i gotta say that i will never recommend something like this ever again.  This Game is a free to paly CoD like shooter that strives to be competitive but will never be.  It runs completely on p2p and even on 50 letency it straight up lags like ♥♥♥♥. if you dont mind lag and dieing for no reason at all then you wont mind this but as a person that know how to play shooters this is infuriating.  This game has horrible coding. rawinput is nowhere to be seen and you will always have ♥♥♥♥♥♥ cheesy control over your aim. Since this is free to play i will completely ignore tha obvious unbalacedness of weapons.The map layouts on many maps is like in cod built to be good at as many modes as possible and this makes search and destroy unplayable.
